nyaya: Chinhu chipi nechipi chinotora nzvimbo uye chine misa
element: Chinhu chakachena chakagadzirwa nemhando imwe chete yeatomu
atomu: Diki yuniti yenyaya inogona kutora chikamu mukuita kwemakemikari
compound: Chinhu chakagadzirwa nezvinhu zviviri kana kupfuura zvakabatanidzwa nekemikari
musanganiswa: Kusanganiswa kwezvinhu zviviri kana kupfuura zvisina kusanganiswa nemakemikari
state: Chimiro chechinhu chiripo (chakasimba, mvura, gasi, plasma)
yakasimba: Mamiriro ezvinhu ane chimiro uye uwandu chaihwo
mvura: Mamiriro ezvinhu ane vhoriyamu chaiyo asi pasina chimiro chaicho
gasi: Mamiriro ezvinhu asina chimiro kana vhoriyamu chaiyo
reaction: Maitiro apo zvinhu zvinoshanduka kuita zvinhu zvitsva
bond: Simba kubata maatomu pamwechete mumorekuru kana komboni
makemikari formula: Shorthand nzira yekumiririra chinhu uchishandisa zviratidzo nenhamba
mhinduro: Homogeneous musanganiswa we solute (yakanyungudika chinhu) uye solvent (kunyungudika chinhu)
concentration: Huwandu hwe solute yakanyungudutswa mune yakapihwa huwandu hwe solvent
neutralization: Kuita pakati peasidhi nechigadziko, kugadzira munyu nemvura
makemikari simba: Simba rinogona kuchengetwa mumakemikari mabhondi echinhu
